items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

ns = self.namespace
mel.eval('human_mirrorPose -mirror "%s"' %ns)
'''
try:
    import rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_switchIkFk
    reload(rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_switchIkFk)
    rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_switchIkFk.mirror()
except:
    import rigStudio2.animTools.rs_switchIkFk
    reload(rigStudio2.animTools.rs_switchIkFk)
    rigStudio2.animTools.rs_switchIkFk.mirror()
'''
self.view.scene().update()
items.name: item_67

import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

ns = self.namespace
mel.eval('human_mirrorPose -symmetrical "%s"' %ns)
'''
try:
    import rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_switchIkFk
    reload(rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_switchIkFk)
    rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_switchIkFk.symmetry()
except:
    import rigStudio2.animTools.rs_switchIkFk
    reload(rigStudio2.animTools.rs_switchIkFk)
    rigStudio2.animTools.rs_switchIkFk.symmetry()
'''
self.view.scene().update()
items.name: item_68

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

mel.eval('resetToDefaultValues;')
'''
try:
    import rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_keepPos
    reload(rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_keepPos)
    rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_keepPos.loadPos()
except:
    import rigStudio2.animTools.rs_keepPos
    reload(rigStudio2.animTools.rs_keepPos)
    rigStudio2.animTools.rs_keepPos.loadPos()

sel = cmds.ls(sl=1)
if sel:
    name = sel[0].split(':')[-1]
    ns = sel[0].split(name)[0]

    for item in self.view.items:
        for c in item.controls:
            if ns+c in sel:
                item.reset_slider()
'''
self.view.scene().update()
items.name: body_reset

import maya.cmds as cmds

if cmds.getModifiers() == 1:

    cmds.select(ns+'controlSet')
print (self )

items.name: fingers_auto

slider_data.script:
multX = 10.0
multY = -10.0

ns = self.namespace

w = self.parent().polygon.width/2
h = self.parent().polygon.height/2

x = self.pos().x()/w*multX
y = -self.pos().y()/h*multY

cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger1.rz', x*5-y*7-40)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger1.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger1.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger2.rz', x*2-y*7-40)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger2.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger2.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger3.rz', -x*3-y*7-40)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger3.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger3.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger4.rz', -x*8-y*7-40)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger4.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_finger4.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_thumb.rz', -y*1)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_thumb.bendA', y*2+0)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'l_thumb.bendB', y*2+0)
slider_data.name: fingers_auto_slider

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

ns = self.namespace or ""

v = cmds.getAttr(ns+'character.clothControls')
cmds.setAttr(ns+'character.clothControls', not v)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'character.skirtControls', not v)

if not v: self.polygon.opacity = 255
else: self.polygon.opacity = 100

self.view.scene().update()
self.view.update()
items.name: cloth_icon

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

# namespace
ns = self.namespace

v = cmds.getAttr(ns+'character.FaceControls')
cmds.setAttr(ns+'character.FaceControls', not v)

if not v: self.polygon.opacity = 255
else: self.polygon.opacity = 100

# cycle all items
root_name = self.main.get_root_name()
views = self.main.views[root_name]
for view in views:
    for item in view.items:
        if item.name == "face_face_icon":
            if not v: item.polygon.opacity = 255
            else: item.polygon.opacity = 100

    view.scene().update()
    view.update()
items.name: face_icon

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

sel = cmds.ls(sl=1)

ns = self.namespace
cmds.select(ns+"l_arm_control")

mel.eval("human_changeFkIk -sl;")

if cmds.getAttr(ns+"l_arm_control.fkIk"):
    self.text.set_text("IK")
    self.set_color(QtGui.QColor(170, 135, 135, 255))
else:
    self.text.set_text("FK")
    self.set_color(QtGui.QColor(100, 130, 150, 255))

if sel:
    cmds.select(sel)
else:
    cmds.select(clear=1)
items.name: ikFk_arm

multX = 10.0
multY = -10.0

ns = self.namespace

w = self.parent().polygon.width/2
h = self.parent().polygon.height/2

x = self.pos().x()/w*multX
y = -self.pos().y()/h*multY

cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger1.rz', -1*(-x*5-y*7-40))
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger1.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger1.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger2.rz', -1*(-x*2-y*7-40))
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger2.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger2.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger3.rz', -1*(x*3-y*7-40))
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger3.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger3.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger4.rz', -1*(x*8-y*7-40))
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger4.bendA', y*5+20)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_finger4.bendB', y*3+10)

cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_thumb.rz', y*1)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_thumb.bendA', y*2+0)
cmds.setAttr(ns+'r_thumb.bendB', y*2+0)

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

mel.eval('resetToDefaultValues;')
'''
try:
    import rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_keepPos
    reload(rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_keepPos)
    rigStudio_picker.animTools.rs_keepPos.loadPos()
except:
    import rigStudio2.animTools.rs_keepPos
    reload(rigStudio2.animTools.rs_keepPos)
    rigStudio2.animTools.rs_keepPos.loadPos()

sel = cmds.ls(sl=1)
if sel:
    name = sel[0].split(':')[-1]
    ns = sel[0].split(name)[0]

    for item in self.view.items:
        for c in item.controls:
            if ns+c in sel:
                item.reset_slider()
'''

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

ns = self.namespace
root_name = self.main.get_root_name()

v = cmds.getAttr(ns+'character.FaceControls')
cmds.setAttr(ns+'character.FaceControls', not v)

if not v: self.polygon.opacity = 255
else: self.polygon.opacity = 100

# cycle all items
views = self.main.views[root_name]
for view in views:
    for item in view.items:
        if item.name == "face_icon":
            if not v: item.polygon.opacity = 255
            else: item.polygon.opacity = 100

    view.scene().update()
    view.update()
items.name: face_face_icon

items.script:
import maya.cmds as cmds
import maya.mel as mel

ns = self.namespace or ""
cmds.select(ns+"face_controlSet")

self.view.scene().update()
